external_references.source_name: Mandiant Remediation and Hardening Strategies for Microsoft 365
external_references.description: Mandiant. (2022, August). Remediation and Hardening Strategies for  Microsoft 365 to Defend Against APT29. Retrieved February 21, 2023.

objects.description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has leveraged compromised high-privileged on-premises accounts synced to Office 365 to move laterally into a cloud environment, including through the use of Azure AD PowerShell.(Citation: Mandiant Remediation and Hardening Strategies for Microsoft 365)
